text: Loving Couples is a 1980 American romantic comedy movie directed by Jack Smight and starring Shirley MacLaine, James Coburn, Susan Sarandon, Stephen Collins, Sally Kellerman, Helena Carroll, Pat Corley, Anne Bloom. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Smight Category:Movies set in San Diego
title: Loving Couples (1980 movie)
